titles.title: To amend title 38 United States Code, to modify the rate of reimbursement of State and local agencies administering veterans education benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

bill.summary:
7/17/2007--Introduced.
Sets $19 million as the maximum amount per fiscal year for reimbursement to states and local agencies administering veterans' education benefits.
